casebody.data:
ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS Supreme Court of Ohio. March 26, 2017

Proposed amendments to the Ohio Code of Judicial Conduct (Jud.Cond. R. 4.6) will be published in the March 26, 2018 Ohio Official Reports advance sheet for a public-comment period ending April 25, 2018. O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concurred in publishing the proposed amendments for comment.
